name: Break Down (Reeds)
description:
A really short dropper game made solo in a day and a half.

How to play:

"A, D" or arrows to move left and right, "Space" to use up a speed level to teleport. "M" to mute music.

While falling, you build up speed levels (show on the bottom of the screen). Certain obstacles can be broken after reaching a high enough speed levels.

Crystals: >

Cracked Platforms: >>

Rocks: >>>

Normal Platforms (unbreakable)
